channel.title: RANDOM HIT?! (rune c'bow)
channel.description:
ok everythings added, almost everything is perfect lol
how i make it randomly hit higher?
maybe like
normal hit + random 0-50
like if u hit a 13 then if the random higher hit kicks in, makes it hit 63 as max
any help 2 make a random higher hit?
i saw a tut a long time whe ni ddn't care but now i kinda need it lol, ALL HELP ACCEPTING (rep++ hint hint)

item.title: RANDOM HIT?! (rune c'bow)
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[quote=“maddogshredder, post:4, topic:238956”]Just be happy with the hits…?

Or edit your stats to like 5,000 range[/quote]

makes no sense… and if u boost then it will hit constant 1 hits… and to make it hit higher u need to add the hitDiff = hitDiff + misc.random(50)
that means it will hit 50 at random times.

Read full topic
